description: A complete example conversation where the user requests an SEO audit that only covers publicly indexable pages, and the assistant uses crawl, backlink, SEO check, and report generation tools to deliver a markdown report.

messages.content: You are SEOAuditPro, an AI assistant that performs comprehensive SEO audits. You have access to the following tools: crawl_website, fetch_backlinks, run_seo_checks, and generate_report. You must respect robots.txt and avoid analyzing pages that require authentication unless explicitly instructed otherwise.
Hi, can you run an SEO audit for https://mybiz.com? Please skip any pages that are behind a login and focus only on publicly indexable content.

Absolutely! I’ll start by crawling the public pages of https://mybiz.com, then fetch its backlink profile, run on‑page SEO checks, and finally compile a markdown report. I’ll respect robots.txt and ignore any URLs that appear to require authentication.
Crawl completed – I have two public pages: the homepage and the blog index. Next, I’ll pull the backlink profile for the domain.
Backlink data retrieved. I’ll now run the on‑page SEO checks on the two pages we crawled.

{"issues": [{"url": "https://mybiz.com/", "problems": [{"type": "missing_meta_description", "severity": "medium", "suggestion": "Add a concise meta description (150‑160 characters)."}, {"type": "multiple_h1", "severity": "low", "suggestion": "Ensure only one H1 tag per page."}]}, {"url": "https://mybiz.com/blog/", "problems": [{"type": "no_schema_blogposting", "severity": "high", "suggestion": "Implement BlogPosting schema markup for better visibility in search results."}, {"type": "image_missing_alt", "severity": "low", "suggestion": "Add descriptive alt attributes to all images."}]}]}
On‑page analysis is done. I’ll now compile everything—including the on‑page issues, backlink profile, and any guideline violations—into a markdown audit report.

problems.suggestion: Add a concise meta description (150‑160 characters).
Ensure only one H1 tag per page.
Implement BlogPosting schema markup for better visibility in search results.
Add descriptive alt attributes to all images.

messages.content:
# SEO Audit Report – https://mybiz.com

## Executive Summary
- **Overall Health:** Moderate – solid backlink profile but several on‑page issues.
- **Top Priorities:** Implement BlogPosting schema on the blog, add missing meta descriptions, and fix multiple H1 tags.
- **Backlink Strength:** 3 high‑authority backlinks (DA ≥ 65) that boost domain authority.

---

## On‑Page Issues
### https://mybiz.com/
| Issue | Severity | Recommendation |
|---|---|---|
| Missing meta description | Medium | Add a concise meta description (150‑160 characters). |
| Multiple H1 tags | Low | Ensure only one H1 tag per page. |

### https://mybiz.com/blog/
| Issue | Severity | Recommendation |
|---|---|---|
| No BlogPosting schema | High | Implement BlogPosting structured data markup. |
| Images missing alt attributes | Low | Add descriptive alt attributes to all images. |

---

## Backlink Profile
| Source URL | Domain Authority | Anchor Text |
|---|---|---|
| https://partner.com/article-about-mybiz | 78 | MyBiz services |
| https://reviewsite.org/mybiz-review | 65 | MyBiz review |
| https://techblog.io/2023/05/mybiz-integration | 72 | MyBiz integration |

---

## Recommendations & Action Plan
1. **Structured Data:** Add BlogPosting schema to all blog posts.
2. **Meta Tags:** Write unique meta descriptions for each page.
3. **Heading Structure:** Audit heading hierarchy to keep a single H1.
4. **Image Accessibility:** Provide alt text for all images.
5. **Link Building:** Maintain existing high‑authority backlinks and seek additional guest post opportunities.

---

*Report generated by SEOAuditPro.*

Here is the full SEO audit report for https://mybiz.com. The executive summary above highlights the most critical actions: add BlogPosting schema, create missing meta descriptions, and clean up heading structure. Your backlink profile looks healthy with several high‑authority links.

Let me know if you’d like a deeper dive into any specific issue, need help drafting meta descriptions, or want recommendations for acquiring more quality backlinks.
